definition: wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: How can she disappear without any message?
sentences.chinese: 她怎麼可以無聲無息的，就在這個城市消失？

sentences.english: On it came-on, silently and stealthily, to the bed's head.
sentences.chinese: 它走上前來，無聲無息偷偷摸摸地摸到了牀頭。

sentences.english: As more time passes real world problems begin to surface.
sentences.chinese: 時間繼續無聲無息得流過，現實問題開始嶄露頭角。

sentences.english: I never give up loving you just become strong, soundless and stir less.
sentences.chinese: 我從未放棄過愛你，只是濃烈變成無聲無息。

sentences.english: When it gets dark in the evening, I have also seen her there quietly.
sentences.chinese: 暮色四合，天暗黑，我也曾遇過她無聲無息的身影。

sentences.english: I felt that it would rain forever , noiselessly .
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這場雨會無聲無息地下個不停。

sentences.english: This can sometimes lead to a silent miscarriage early in the pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 有時會導致在懷孕期間無聲無息的早期流產。

sentences.english: Can laugh about people who breathe naturally also be crying quietly.
sentences.chinese: 能笑到快要斷氣的人自然也可以哭得無聲無息。

sentences.english: It glided noiselessly towards the recumbent woman.
sentences.chinese: 它無聲無息地向那斜倚着的女人走去。

sentences.english: Your soundless and stirless, poured into the bottom of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 你無聲無息，湧入了我心底。

sentences.english: Love, soundless and stirless in falling into, the innocent smile.
sentences.chinese: 愛，無聲無息的駐進，劃落了純真的笑顏。

sentences.english: He moved to Argentina where he lived in obscurity.
sentences.chinese: 他移居阿根廷，無聲無息地過活。

sentences.english: Met a rather unceremonious end at the bottom of a smoke stack.
sentences.chinese: 他最後無聲無息地死在了煙囪底部。

sentences.english: The door slid open almost noiselessly.
sentences.chinese: 門幾乎無聲無息的滑開。

sentences.english: Look at the foothold, and then place the foot quietly and precisely on the hold, with no thunking or clunking.
sentences.chinese: 看着腳點，然後無聲無息地將腳準確地踩在點上。

definition: lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
to lose one's head out of fear (idiom)
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
